nodes.text: Pair O'Dice was one of the more famous casinos located on the floating Cloud City on the Outer Rim planet Bespin.

Pair O'Dice was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Pair O'Dice was introduced in Galaxy Guide 2: Yavin and Bespin, a 1989 West End Games sourcebook created for use with the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
